title: LEGO.Pirates.of.the.Caribbean.Repack-R.G.Mechanics

Processor: Pentium 4 1.8 GHz, AMD Athlon or equivalent
Memory: 512 MB
Video: 128 MB of memory, support for DirectX 9.0 and Shader 2.0
Sound Card: Sound device compatible with DirectX Ã‚Â® 9.0

Description:

Pirate romance, adventure and desperate humor special favorite Disney 
characters in the style of LEGO! Welcome aboard!
Embark on an epic journey based on the eponymous pirate saga of Disney, 
where the vast world of "Pirates of the Caribbean" will appear before 
you as colored blocks of LEGO. Try yourself in the role of Captain 
Jack Sparrow and experiencing again the memorable scenes from all 
four movies - now in a bizarre style video game series from LEGO. 
Do you have enough courage to piracy? You are ready to become a 
pirate in the world LEGO? Prove to everyone that these adventures - they're real!

Features:

-Original story told in a new way.
-More than 20 recognizable locations from all four films.
-Jack Sparrow, Captain Barbossa, Davy Jones and more than 70 other characters.
-A unique series of games LEGO humor and films "Pirates of the Caribbean.
-Opportunity to re-take levels for the new scenario, to reveal all the secrets, 
-Finding bonuses and cherished treasures.
-Double the fun of adventure, playing with a friend in cooperative mode.

Repack Features 

LEGO Pirates of the Caribbean
Do not cut / recoded
Includes Update 1
